summary: Chevron is a huge American company that mainly works in oil and gas. It started in California in the 1870s and was once part of a bigger company called Standard Oil. Over time, it grew and became one of the biggest oil companies globally. Now, it operates in many countries and does everything from finding oil to selling gas and making chemicals. Chevron is moving its headquarters from California to Texas. It's one of the largest companies worldwide and is known for its fuel, lubricants, and petrochemicals.
title: Chevron Corporation
